meanings.definition: The act of selling something that has already been sold once before.
meanings.sent1: She made a profit from the resales of her old clothes.
meanings.sent2: The store specializes in resales of vintage furniture.
meanings.sent3: The resales of the same toy over and over again became a running joke among the kids.
meanings.sent4: His resales of rare stamps were like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The resales of the antique jewelry sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Items that are sold again after being purchased previously.
meanings.sent1: Online platforms make it easy to find resales of electronics.
meanings.sent2: The resales of concert tickets were in high demand.
meanings.sent3: The resales of the same book kept popping up everywhere like magic.
meanings.sent4: Her resales of handmade crafts were like little treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The resales of the limited edition sneakers flew off the shelves.
